Jan Schuette
============

![Jan Schuette](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=835 "Jan Schuette")





Jan Schuette, Position 7
------------------------

Phone: 360-201-3527

[Email](mailto:jans@arlingtonwa.gov)

Term expires December 31, 2025
Elected January 1, 2014

Retired Stanwood High School Principal

Jan has one son, Nic Olinsky, Director of Technology Sunnyside School District, and one daughter, Dr. Ashley Schuette, Symmetry Chiropractic Wellness Center, Arlington

"I love to travel to China, Italy, Mexico, and Germany. I also love wine tasting in Yakima Valley."

* Puget Sound Regional Council (PSRC) Transportation Policy Board Member

"I spent 18 years as a school district administrator, 16 of those years were spent creating, securing funding and implementing job training programs to provide the community with a skilled labor force. I intend to pursue additional job training/re-training opportunities that provide living wages for our citizens."

"Making Arlington all that it can be."
